story: Mona Radwan shared CSP /AAST / CAIRO's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Fundamentals of Agile Software Development
caption: Fundamentals of Agile Software Development
description:
Course Details
============
Fundamentals of Agile software development course introduced from Agile Arena company is now hosted and supported by Arab Academy for Science, Technology & Maritime Transport in Cairo.
Agile mindset and techniques are the best approach for managing complex software development projects. It introduces the new psychology of success, where the Growth mindset enables you to validate your assumptions & reduce uncertainty by discover and learn through valuable output
Create innovative products and realize business value early and often
Reduce time to product/market fit. During this dynamic 3 days certification class, you will delve into key agile concepts such as:

Value-driven development
Adaptive planning
Progressive elaboration
Frequent feedback for continuous improvement

As a participant, you will walk away with a solid understanding of the processes and the environment of an agile project, and the tools and techniques used in delivering value the agile way. You will also walk away with the attendance certificate from Arab Academy for Science, Technology & Maritime Transport in Cairo accredited from Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Egypt.

Outline
======
•	Waterfall versus iterative development
•	History of Agile software development 
•	Agile Mindset, values and principles
•	Misconceptions about Agile & common failure patterns 
•	Scrum overview
•	Agile roles & responsibilities
•	User Stories requirements gathering technique
•	Relative Estimates & Story Points
•	Agile Planning techniques
•	Agile Tracking techniques 
•	Developing a self-organized team
•	Overview about the technical practices that enhance Agility

Price:
=====
Early Bird: 1000 EGP (until 15 May - 2016)
Regular:    1500 EGP (until 20 May - 2016)

For Registration Please call 01005666005 / 01098885942
